title: 09/18: Waiver Wire; Gordon Trade (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Who are our top Waiver Wire priorities this week (2:00)? It's Giovani Bernard ahead of the pack, but don't forget about Corey Clement, and the TB WRs lead a deep group of pass catchers. Also we discuss Phillip Lindsay's value (10:00) and the Josh Gordon trade (11:15). We've got some sell high candidates after this trade! ... Big news around the NFL (16:00) and a recap of NYG-DAL and SEA-CHI (25:50). And it's Dropometer time (34:01)! ... Waiver Wire QBs (35:25) including Ryan Fitzpatrick and Andy Dalton, RBs (41:30) including Javorius Allen and Latavius Murray, WRs (44:00) including John Brown and Keelan Cole, TEs (51:48) including Will Dissly and O.J. Howard, DSTs (55:02) and Kickers as well. Plus Team Name Tuesday at the end of the show! ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
